languages.text: {n}Маражай молчит несколько мгновений.{/n} "Твои интонации мне не по нраву, Караэль. Ты слишком... дерзкий. Ты забываешь свое место, если действительно собрался служить мне как новому повелителю".
{n}Marazhai is silent for a few moments.{/n} "I do not like your tone, Kharael. You are too insolent. You are forgetting your place if you truly are going to serve me as the new Archon."
languages.original_text: {n}Маражай молчит несколько мгновений.{/n} "Твои интонации мне не по нраву, Караэль. Ты слишком... дерзкий. Ты забываешь свое место, если действительно собрался служить мне как новому повелителю".

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai is silent for a few moments.{/n} "I do not like your tone, Kharael. You are too insolent. You are forgetting your place if you really are going to serve me as the new Archon."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai schweigt einige Augenblicke lang.{/n} "Mir gefällt Euer Ton nicht, Kharael. Ihr seid zu anmaßend. Ihr vergesst Eure Stellung, wenn Ihr mir wirklich als der neue Archon dienen wollt."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai is silent for a few moments.{/n} "I do not like your tone, Kharael. You are too insolent. You are forgetting your place if you truly are going to serve me as the new Archon."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai schweigt einige Augenblicke lang.{/n} "Mir gefällt Euer Ton nicht, Kharael. Ihr seid zu anmaßend. Ihr vergesst Eure Stellung, wenn Ihr mir wirklich als der neue Archon dienen wollt."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋沉默片刻。{/n}“我不喜欢你的语气，卡瑞尔。你太无礼了，如果你真的打算尊奉我为新的执政官，那你显然忘了自己的位置。”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai is silent for a few moments.{/n} "I do not like your tone, Kharael. You are too insolent. You are forgetting your place if you truly are going to serve me as the new Archon."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋沉默片刻。{/n}“我不喜欢你的语气，卡瑞尔。你太无礼了，如果你真的打算尊奉我为新的执政官，那你显然忘了自己的位置。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai reste silencieux un moment.{/n} « Changez de ton, Kharael. Vous êtes trop insolent. Si je deviens le nouvel archonte, il va falloir vous remettre à votre place. »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai is silent for a few moments.{/n} "I do not like your tone, Kharael. You are too insolent. You are forgetting your place if you truly are going to serve me as the new Archon."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai reste silencieux un moment.{/n} « Changez de ton, Kharael. Vous êtes trop insolent. Si je deviens le nouvel archonte, il va falloir vous remettre à votre place. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai guarda silencio unos momentos.{/n} «No me gusta tu tono, Kharael. Olvidas tu posición, si de verdad esperas servirme como tu nuevo Arconte».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai is silent for a few moments.{/n} "I do not like your tone, Kharael. You are too insolent. You are forgetting your place if you truly are going to serve me as the new Archon."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai guarda silencio unos momentos.{/n} «No me gusta tu tono, Kharael. Olvidas tu posición, si de verdad esperas servirme como tu nuevo Arconte».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}マラズハイは数秒黙り込む。{/n}「お前の言い方が気に入らないんだ、カラエル。あまりにも無礼じゃないか。本当に新たなアーコンとして俺に仕える気があるのなら、立場を忘れていることになる」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai is silent for a few moments.{/n} "I do not like your tone, Kharael. You are too insolent. You are forgetting your place if you truly are going to serve me as the new Archon."

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイは数秒黙り込む。{/n}「お前の言い方が気に入らないんだ、カラエル。あまりにも無礼じゃないか。本当に新たなアーコンとして俺に仕える気があるのなら、立場を忘れていることになる」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai, bir süre sessiz kalıyor.{/n} "Ses tonundan hoşlanmadım Kharael. Küstahça konuşuyorsun. Yeni Arkon olduğumda bana gerçekten hizmet edeceksen haddini bilmiyorsun demektir."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai is silent for a few moments.{/n} "I do not like your tone, Kharael. You are too insolent. You are forgetting your place if you truly are going to serve me as the new Archon."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai bir süre sessiz kalıyor.{/n} "Ses tonundan hoşlanmadım Kharael. Küstahsın da aynı zamanda. Gerçekten de yeni Arkon olduğumda bana hizmet edeceksen, haddini bilmiyorsun demektir."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
